docs.snippet: The Mets continued to fill out their bullpen, announcing that they had signed Kyle Farnsworth to a minor league deal....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Mets continued to fill out their bullpen, announcing that they had signed Kyle Farnsworth to a minor league deal.
docs.abstract: New York Mets continue to fill out their bullpen, announcing that they have signed Kyle Farnsworth to a minor league deal, with an invitation to spring training; other baseball news noted.

docs.snippet: Former All-Star outfielder Jason Heyward, who suffered an injury-plagued 2013 season, has avoided arbitration and agreed to a two-year contract with the Atlanta Braves, the Major League Baseball team said on Tuesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Former All-Star outfielder Jason Heyward, who suffered an injury-plagued 2013 season, has avoided arbitration and agreed to a two-year contract with the Atlanta Braves, the Major League Baseball team said on Tuesday.

headline.main: Heyward Agrees Two-Year Deal With the Braves
headline.print_headline: Heyward Agrees Two-Year Deal With the Braves

docs.snippet: One of three Oklahoma teenagers charged with fatally shooting an Australian student athlete who was jogging in a small town in August testified on Tuesday that a co-defendant had pulled the trigger and later said he thought the handgun held blanks...
docs.lead_paragraph: One of three Oklahoma teenagers charged with fatally shooting an Australian student athlete who was jogging in a small town in August testified on Tuesday that a co-defendant had pulled the trigger and later said he thought the handgun held blanks.

headline.main: Oklahoma Teen Testifies Co-Defendant Fired Shot That Killed Australian
headline.print_headline: Oklahoma Teen Testifies Co-Defendant Fired Shot That Killed Australian

docs.snippet: One of three boys accused in the fatal shooting of an Australian baseball player last summer said in court Tuesday that his friends believed the gun used in the crime contained only blanks....
docs.lead_paragraph: One of three boys accused in the fatal shooting of an Australian baseball player last summer said in court Tuesday that his friends believed the gun used in the crime contained only blanks.

headline.main: Okla. Teen: Friends Thought Gun Only Held Blanks
headline.print_headline: Okla. Teen: Friends Thought Gun Only Held Blanks

docs.snippet: Jason Heyward is happy he can report to spring training without having to worry about salary arbitration....
docs.lead_paragraph: Jason Heyward is happy he can report to spring training without having to worry about salary arbitration.

docs.snippet: A slightly unusual word choice can enliven a story. But we should make sure we know what our slightly unusual word actually means. Here are several recent cases where we reached for a word, only to come up with the wrong one or to use it incorrect...
